alert.note: Alert for Bay (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 5:12PM EDT until July 14 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bay County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 511 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Linwood, or 8 miles southwest of Pinconning, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Linwood around 525 PM EDT. Kawkawlin around 535 PM EDT. Bay City around 540 PM EDT. Essexville around 545 PM EDT. Munger around 605 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Crump, Willard and Bay City State Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
